plot: Documentary on the Polish artist Jerzy Nowosiwelski, who painted religious icons, using the techniques he learned from orthodox monks.
title: Jerzy Nowosielski. Liturgia

plot_en: Documentary on the Polish artist Jerzy Nowosiwelski, who painted religious icons, using the techniques he learned from orthodox monks.
